Tlipoca fights with a lot of cards that #yTemporarily modifies cards' cost. #yTemporary cost changes will last until your turn ends. NL There will be a small PINK number right upon the cost number to show the true cost of that card in this combat.

#bEphermeral and #bResonate cards are different from normal cards, when they are in your hand, almost EVERY card played will result int #yTemporary cost change in them. #bEphermeral cards are shown with light pink border while #bResonate ones are #glime #ggreen.
Moreover, if a card has #yEternity , its cost is constant once it shows up. You cannot change its cost in any ways, in combat, events or any other ways.
